text: for me the way that I deal with it is if
I lose a big hand I the first thing that
happens is I start
thinking did I do anything wrong in the
hand let me think about in in a sort of
deconstructive way an analytical way
what was my play during the hand what
was the other players responses could I
done something different should I have
done anything different was anything in
my control that went wrong now that does
two things the first thing is that it
shuts down it kind of shuts down that
sort of lyic system response and gets
you into your frontal lobe which is
actually really important so the frontal
lobe is where we think the lyic system
is where we have our emotions if we let
our lyic system go really light up then
that actually shuts our frontal lobe
down so we're not going to think clearly
going forward so by immediately saying
I'm I'm going to start thinking about
this analytically and I'm going to start
going through the hand you're really
subverting that that sort of emotional
response through almost through
distraction but there's actually sort of
a a psychophysiological thing that's
going on but the other thing it does is
it really trains you to look at mistakes
as opportunities which I think is really
important to to say there isn't a
failure like I didn't fail in a hand I
made a mistake and that's an opportunity
for me to learn and not make that
mistake in the future and really become
a better poker player because of
something I might have done wrong and
sometimes the conclusion after you've
gone through this is not that you did
anything wrong but things just went
wrong like you had aces and they had
fives and they put all their money in
the pot when they were only going to win
18% of the time and and they happen to
win and those kinds of things you don't
have any control over and I think very
good poker players get very good at
saying I'm not going to get upset about
things that I have no control over I'm
going to focus on the things that I do
have control over because those are the
things that are going to make me a
winning player in the future
